title: Lofts, Lofts & More Lofts to Come....!!! W/D Included
posting_body: ['*** Promotion Special - Ready Units Get 2 Week Free (Move in within 14 days) ***', 'Amazing, Non-smoking buildings, fantastic floorplans, two blocks from the beach with Spacious closets, Great Price!', 'Perfect Location!', 'Please check out our website: <URL> or call', 'show contact info', 'for information and virtual tours.', 'The Lifestyle You Want Awaits You at The Gallery at Playa Pacifica!!', 'Call', 'show contact info', 'Today for Social Distancing Tours or Virtual tour of Your New Home!!', 'An intimate community hidden away from close to the beach, close to dining, shopping, and entertainment.', 'The Gallery at Playa Pacifica will treat you to the lifestyle you deserve!', 'Studio, one-, and two-bedroom floor plans designed with you in mind, that include gourmet kitchens, plush interior, and white cabinetry.', 'Walk-in closets are a few of the added bonuses in your new home!', 'Sparkling pools, fitness center, and sculptured landscaping throughout are delightful ways to rest!', 'The Gallery at Playa Pacifica provides a unique way of living!', 'Come see for yourself why our community is the perfect place to call home!', 'Schedule an In Person Social Distancing Tour or Virtual Tour Today to See the Apartment and All Our Amenities.', 'Pet Policy: We are pet friendly.', 'Please contact our leasing office for details', 'Parking: Assigned Parking Space in Parking Garage $20/month', 'We offer 6- or 13-month leases only.', '*Pricing and availability subject to change daily*', 'Services:', '24 hr. laundry facilities', 'Controlled Access', '24 hr. maintenance on call', 'Courtesy Patrol', 'Recycling', 'Fitness Center', 'Smoke-free buildings', 'Features:', 'Balcony/patio (available in some apartments)', 'Cable Ready', 'Tub/Shower', 'In Unit Laundry (select units)', 'Kitchen:', 'Either Stainless Steel or White Appliances', 'Refrigerator', 'Dishwasher (available in some apartments)', 'Disposal', 'Microwave', 'Living space:', 'Carpet', 'Solid Surface Flooring (available in some apartments)', 'Dining Room', 'Walk-In Closets', 'Window Coverings', 'Office hours at The Gallery at Playa Pacifica', 'Monday through Saturday 9:00 am- 6:00 pm &; Sundays 10:00 am-4:00pm', '415 Herondo Street', 'Hermosa Beach, CA 90254', 'show contact info', '$50.00 (Credit/background check and Processing)']
